page.title: 04HISTORY OF CEFN SCHOOL
page.content: {A BRIEF HISTORY OF CEFN MEIRIADOG {SCHOOL. { }THE SCHOOL NOW HAS 28 PUPILS WHICH WILL RISE TO 30 IN SEPTEMBER.THE FIRST SCHOOL WAS ESTABLISHED IN THE CHAPEL VESTRY ON THE 7th.SEPTEMBER 1920.THE FIRST TEACHERS WERE MISS DILYS JONES(HEAD) AND MISS ANNE JAMES,WHO WRE RESPONSIBLE FOR 25 PUPILS.WITHIN A VERY SHORT PERIOD OF TIME THIS NUMBER INCREASED TO OVER 50 PUPILS, AND A TENT WAS ERECTED IN A FIELD TO SERVE AS AN EXTRA CLASSROOM. THAT SUMMER IN THE LATE 1920's WAS A VERY WET ONE AND THE IRON DESKS IN THE TENT CLASS STARTED TO SINK INTO THE GROUND.AT THE END OF EACH DAY A TEACHER HAD TO CLOSE THE TENT FLAP.ONE DAY THIS TASK WAS NOT DONE AND A SMALL CALF ENTERED THE TENT AND GOT IT'S HEAD WEDGED IN THE EASEL.THE CALF RAN AROUND THE CLASS AND CAUSED MUCH HAVOC
